casebody.data:
State
v.
Willie Bernard Melvin 209P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Willie B. Melvin, for Melvin, Willie Bernard. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of May 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review of the Order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
